00038 template<class TESTEDCLASS> 
00039 class CaptionTest : public CPPUNIT_NS::TestFixture 
00040 {

00116   int countTestCases(){
00117     return 1;

00123   void setUp(){ 
00124     this->m_caption = new TESTEDCLASS;

00126

00131     delete this->m_caption;

00140   void testCaptionText(){ 
00141     std::string t="TestString";
00142     this->m_caption->setText(t);
00143     std::string ret=this->m_caption->getText();
00144     int cmp=t.compare(ret);
00145     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( cmp==0 );
00146   }
00147 
00154   void testCaptionType(){ 
00155     RainbruRPG::Terminal::tCaptionType t=RainbruRPG::Terminal::SCROLLED;
00156     this->m_caption->setType(t);
00157     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_caption->getType()==t );
00158   }
00159 
00166   void testCaptionHeight(){
00167     int h=12;
00168     this->m_caption->setHeight(h);
00169     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_caption->getHeight()==h );
00170   }
00171 
00178   void testCaptionWidth(){
00179     int h=10;
00180     this->m_caption->setWidth(h);
00181     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_caption->getWidth()==h );
00182   }
00183

00193     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_caption->getXOffset()==h );
00194   }
00195
